paper_abstract: By using a linear operator, which is defined here by means of the Hadamard product (or convolution), the authors introduce some new classes of analytic and multivalent functions in the open unit disk and investigate their inclusion relationships and convolution properties. Integral transforms of functions in these classes are also discussed. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Some classes of analytic and multivalent functions involving a linear operator
